snippet.title: 30 Tips To Improve Your Google Searches [Infographic]
snippet.content:
Google's , tons of different tools. Over on Zapier, they outline tons of different advanced tricks for searching Google as quickly as possible.
Lifehacker alum Melanie Pinola digs into tons of Google search tips here, including some that are easy to forget, like the , instant customer service phone numbers (search for the company named followed by "customer service"), and . Head over to the full post on Zapier for tons of detailed info, or check out the infographic below.
[Via ]
